Title: The Bachelor Party
Writer: Paddy Chayefsky (screenplay), Paddy Chayefsky (story "The Bachelor Party")
Actors: Don Murray, E.G. Marshall, Jack Warden, Philip Abbott
Plot: Five office friends meet up for a night on the town to celebrate the forthcoming marriage of one of them. As the night wears on and the drink starts to tell, they become more confidential ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
